Directions: In a skillet, cook beef, onion and garlic over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Transfer to a 5-qt. slow cooker. Add the remaining ingredients and mix well. Cover and cook on low for 5 hours or until vegetables are tender.
Ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
1 (15 ounce) can butter beans, rinsed and drained
1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, undrained
1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed vegetable soup, undiluted
